nodes.name: 01-Human-Error-EDA
nodes.description: This node allows user to select the list of workflows in the project to create a pipeline.
nodes.details:
Workflow


This node allows user to select the list of workflows in the project to create a pipeline.
nodes.examples:
Workflow Examples


Example of Creating a Workflow Node


{
"workflowUUID": "12345-abcde-67890-fghij",
"sparkConf": "",
"notes": ""
}

Explanation

  • This example demonstrates how to create a Workflow node by selecting a specific workflow identified by its UUID.

Usage

  • Task ID: "workflow_task"

Example of Creating a Workflow Node with Spark Configuration and Notes


{
"workflowUUID": "12345-abcde-67890-fghij",
"sparkConf": "spark.executor.memory=4g,spark.driver.memory=2g",
"notes": "This workflow processes data for the quarterly report."
}

Explanation

  • This example illustrates how to create a Workflow node while also specifying Spark configuration options and adding notes about the workflow's purpose.

Usage

  • Task ID: "workflow_with_spark_conf_task"

fields.name: wf_parameters
